duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, repair, and maintain poles, cables, and conduits for aerial and buried cable installations
Operate heavy machinery and perform routine maintenance work
Measure signal strength, test lines, and analyze test results for transmission characteristics
Lay underground cable, string it through conduits, and pull cables to proper tension using the necessary equipment
Follow industry standards, read and interpret staking sheets and blueprints, and maintain work scope on the project
Participate in engineering, permit, and construction processes as required
Perform routine maintenance, recognize and repair route issues, and fill and tamp holes as required

education_certification.credential: 1 year of outside plant construction experience or related Trade School certification in-lieu of one year of experience
Minimum qualifications to obtain a CDL
